balik ka sa burp makikita mo sa http history kung ano binuksan niya



nmap....
/opt/lampp
nikto -h 192.168.0.107
nmap -p 80(target port) 192.168.0.107




apt install mysql -y
service mysql restart
service mysql status "makikita mo na active running"
mysql -u root
show databases;
